document_title: Meningococcal meningitis: Signs, causes, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_content: The incidence of meningococcal meningitis in children depends on the child's age: the younger the child, the higher the risk of getting this disease and vice versa, the older the child, the lower the risk of getting the disease.
subsection_title: viem mang nao mo cau.json. Subjects susceptible to meningococcal disease
subsection_data:
viem mang nao mo cau.json. Subjects susceptible to meningococcal disease
The incidence of meningococcal meningitis in children depends on the child's age: the younger the child, the higher the risk of getting this disease and vice versa, the older the child, the lower the risk of getting the disease.
